valid_from.description: Moment this DDBC.SystemDescription starts to be valid. If the system description is immediately valid, the DateTimeStamp should be now or in the past.

actuators.description: List of all available actuators in the system. Must contain at least one DDBC.ActuatorAggregated.

present_demand_rate.description: Present demand rate that needs to be satisfied by the system

provides_average_demand_rate_forecast.description: Indicates whether the Resource Manager could provide a demand rate forecast through the DDBC.AverageDemandRateForecast.
